title: Greater Albion Releases Two New Families, and a Forthcoming Preview
content:
Greater Albion has just released its two latest families, Granville and Federal Streamliner on Myfonts.com. Both families are being offered there at an introductory 25% discount.

YOu can see examples of them in action on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031905/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). You can also see a preview of a forthcoming release - Howlett - there.
author: Rasendyll
